CHAT.comment: JEFF PREMO, SUPERINTENDENT, OREGON STATE PENITENTIARY, Petitioner v. RANDY JOSEPH MOORE
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:06 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GENERAL JOHN R. KROGER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF STEVEN T. WAX ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF GENERAL JOHN R. KROGER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:54 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
